Chapter One This was [the last place [Samantha Matthews]50-sam wanted to be]114-the last place samantha matthews wanted to be . The dentist with [some random person]115-some random person ’s fingers in [her]115-some random person mouth . Standing in the pouring rain in a sheer white shirt with no bra on . Hiking in ten feet of snow with only a pair of high heels to protect [her]115-some random person feet . Stuck in [an elevator]116-an elevator with [[her]115-some random person ex from college]117-her ex from college . Heck , all those things combined , shoved into one day … Would still be preferable to this . Caviar and champagne filled the tabletops around [her]115-some random person . Expensive perfume peppered the air . Priceless pearls dangled around necks . Diamonds twinkled in the lights . [Gucci]51-gucci and Prada draped over artfully exposed shoulders . Stuffy voices with fake , trilling laughs topped off what was pretty much [her]115-some random person worst nightmare . [She]115-some random person ’d always won that contest , even at a young age . Those days are gone . Tonight , [she]115-some random person ’d forgone the private appointments for a custom gown and worn a dress [she]115-some random person bought on clearance at [Macy ’s]3-macy ’s last year . Today it was . Chapter Thirteen The next night , [Sam]50-sam was still no closer to being tired of [Taylor]58-taylor than [she]222-his mother ’d been when [she]222-his mother went [home]188-home with [him]540-he the first night . [[Taylor]58-taylor ’s [home]188-home]543-taylor ’s home was starting to feel like — well , [home]188-home . [The floors]546-the floors were no longer overkill . The fire no longer seemed lavish . [She]222-his mother was [an inspiration and a lesson in humility]555-an inspiration and a lesson in humility , all in one beautiful package . Around [her]222-his mother , [he]540-he came up inadequate , and [he]540-he was inspired to match [her]222-his mother kindness and [her]222-his mother heart , something [he]540-he suspected [he]540-he might never do . [No one]264-no one would ever be as good , as giving , as [Sam]50-sam . Maybe that was why [he]540-he did n’t want [their]557-their “ date ”[558-they] to end . [He]540-he lived by a strict set of rules , and they existed for a reason , despite how much [Sam]50-sam liked to tease [him]540-he … and [they]558-they should n’t be broken , because [they]558-they keep life in order and under control . [People]148-people liked to say that life was n’t [yours]560-you to control , that [God]72-god had bigger plans than [you]560-you could touch . [He]540-he called bullshit on that . [You]560-you could control [your]560-you life , if [you]560-you wanted to . Set some boundaries , lay down some rules and routines , and [you]560-you ’d know what was coming next because [you]560-you planned it that way . But with [Sam]50-sam … [He]540-he was veering off the plan . Just incoherent squealing and shrieking . “ [You]850-her have to promise , in front of [everyone]204-everyone , to be [mine]850-her for the rest of [our]1484-our lives . [I]851-he love [you]850-her so much , more than [I]851-he ever thought possible , and the only way [I]851-he could be any happier is if [you]850-her did [me]851-he the honor of being [[my]851-he wife]1485-my wife . ”[851-he] [He]851-he swallowed , [his]851-he hand shaking slightly , which only made [her]850-her eyes tear up even more , because [Taylor]58-taylor never trembled . “ [Sam]50-sam , will [you]851-he marry [me]850-her ? ”[850-her] [She]850-her lowered [her]850-her hands , tears streaming down [her]850-her cheeks . “ What did [you]851-he say [your]851-he answer would always be to [me]850-her ? ”[850-her] “ [I]851-he … ”[851-he] [He]851-he swallowed again . “ [I]851-he want to hear [you]851-he say it . ”[851-he] “ Yes . ”[850-her] [She]850-her sat up and swung [her]850-her knees over the side of the couch , covering [his]851-he hand with both of [hers]850-her . “ Always yes . ”[851-he] [He]851-he closed the distance between [them]855-them , kissing [her]850-her , and [she]850-her clung to [him]851-he with [her]850-her eyes shut and [her]850-her heart pounding so loudly [she]850-her could n’t hear the internal shrieking anymore . When [he]851-he pulled back , [he]851-he gently slid the ring on [her]850-her finger , running [his]851-he hand over [her]850-her knuckle . “ [I]851-he love [you]850-her , [Sam]50-sam . So damn much . ”[851-he] “ [I]851-he love [you]850-her , too . ”[851-he] [He]851-he kissed [her]850-her again , and as [he]851-he lowered [her]850-her on the couch and slid [his]851-he body over [hers]850-her , [she]850-her thanked [God]72-god that a year ago , [she]850-her ’d been too distracted and bid on [the wrong man]856-the wrong man , because [he]851-he was , hands down , the best mistake [she]850-her ’d ever made .
